The '''J.R.R. Tolkien Centenary Conference''' was a conference which commemorated the one-hundredth anniversary of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s birth ([[1892]]). It was held at Keble College, Oxford [[17 August|16]]-[[24 August]], [[1992]]. Organised by both [[The Tolkien Society]]  and the [[Mythopoeic Society]], it was a combination of [[Oxonmoot]] [[1992]] and [[Mythcon]] 23.
